Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won by 6 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Sri Lanka hope to end World Cup duck against Pakistan
Pakistan have two points and a win pinned to their lapel, while Sri Lanka remain unadorned at the points table
Pakistan's middle order has suddenly sprung to life, with Haris Rauf showing he was back to his best
Sri Lanka might consider writing off their bowling performance against South Africa and starting over
Sri Lanka's Charith Asalanka is one of the best middle-overs batters in the world at the moment
Fakhar Zaman's poor form has seen the pressure pile on him, and with Abdullah Shafique waiting in the wings, expect him to come into the side
Sri Lanka may consider a change or two in their bowling line-up after what happened against South Africa
Some cloud cover is expected in Hyderabad during the game, but no rain. The pitch should be conducive to big scores
